name: Web Design
description: Modern, responsive, and SEO-friendly website design for businesses and personal brands.
details: Includes homepage, about page, services page, contact form, responsive layout, and basic SEO setup.

reviews.comment: Amazing design! Very clean and professional.

name: Full Stack Development
description: End-to-end MERN stack development with robust backend and elegant UI.
details: Includes API development, authentication, database integration, admin panel, and deployment.

reviews.comment: Full functional app delivered on time. Great experience!

name: Portfolio Builder
description: Automatic developer portfolio generator based on your uploaded content.
details: Includes sections for skills, projects, experience, blog, contact form, and custom theme options.

reviews.comment: Very useful tool! My portfolio looks great.

name: Branding Kit
description: Complete branding package for small businesses and startups.
details: Includes logo design, color palette, typography, brand guidelines, and social media templates.

reviews.comment: Loved the logo and color palette. Highly recommended.

name: SEO Optimization
description: Improve rankings, site performance, and visibility across search engines.
details: Includes technical SEO, keyword research, site audit, speed optimization, and on-page fixes.

reviews.comment: My website traffic increased within 3 weeks. Great service!

name: Mobile App UI
description: Modern mobile application interface design following industry best UX practices.
details: Includes up to 10 mobile screens, color system, icons, typography, and design system components.

reviews.comment: The UI design was clean and user-friendly. Perfect for my app!
